attributes.action: Force LGO compensation to be reviewed by the high court to pay out fairly
attributes.additional_details: Benefits I would have still claimed would be upwards of £50,000 loss of my furniture and posessions to replace £10,000 distress and suicide attempts and damage to my health and wellbeing being homeless floating on sofa's requires compensation too, the council "losing applications and proofs and scoring housing applications wrong in the timebeing with 40 day delays between every response delaying further and causing more stress needs at least £150,000 compensation, a high court would pay out on.
attributes.background: My housing benefit was delayed illegally 9+ months despite proofs provided, new benefit applications and every attempt to get them paid, lost my home and possessions, council mess me around 4 years lgo delays and eventually offers £400 for the loss of 4 years of my life, completely unreasonable

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it is not clear what you would like the UK Government and Parliament to do. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
